project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement function to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement function to convert Celsius to Kelvin
Implement function to convert Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement function to convert Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement function to convert Kelvin to Celsius
Implement function to convert Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement command-line interface (CLI) for user input
Write tests for each temperature conversion function
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
